Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE Myeloid Neoplasms Comprehensive Oncoheme Next-Generation Sequencing, Varies
Specimen Type: Extracted genomic DNA (from peripheral blood, bone marrow, or other myeloid tissue)
Purpose: To detect and characterize genetic mutations associated with myeloid neoplasms using a comprehensive next-generation sequencing panel.
Container: Varies (original specimen typically collected in an EDTA tube or other DNA-compatible container)
Equipment: NGS sequencer (e.g., Illumina MiSeq/NextSeq), PCR thermal cycler, Qubit Fluorometer, Agilent Bioanalyzer, laminar flow hood, microcentrifuge, vortex mixer
